title: How long does it usually take support to reply to my tickets?
body: while I was entering my prepaid card codes it told me many times that it could not process the codes at this time due to some error and now I have to wait 24 hours to enter the code again and quite frankly I'm not happy in the slightest. I would like to know how long it usually take for support to answer a ticket?

replies.body: Typically billing type tickets like this get answered relatively quickly, but it all depends on the current influx of tickets of course. I saw your 2 tickets in the queue now, and someone should be grabbing at least one of them shortly. Keep in mind that 'bumping' or creating multiple tickets doesn't help get an answer faster, but could actually slow down the process as a whole due to having more tickets and replies.
